Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
So, you’ve got some leads— now let’s turn them into successful contracts. We are following our latest webinar on finding new business with an expert session on how to create clients out of your new leads.
Join us Tuesday, September 18 at 1pm EST for Win New Consulting Business: The Four Keys to Writing a Successful Proposal <http://info.mbopartners.com/Sept18WebProposals.html>.
Our guest expert is prominent author Tom Sant, whom the American Management Association calls, “America’s foremost practitioner of proposal writing.” Tom’s methods are proven successful as evidenced by a survey of over 400 companies who have implemented them. These companies showed a 39% improvement in proposal win rate. He’s also the author of three best-selling books on the proposal writing process.
In this free webinar, Tom will teach you four keys to make your proposal stand out— and win the contract. Grow your business by registering <http://info.mbopartners.com/Sept18WebProposals.html> today.
Also, if you missed out on registering for our free September 6 webinar, it’s not too late! Register here <http://info.mbopartners.com/Sept6Webinar-LeadGen.html> to learn about prospecting and finding leads. ___________________________________ The MBO Marketing Team t: 1-800-220-0469 e: info@mbopartners.com
